{{cpp/title|toupper{{small|(std::locale)}}}}
{{cpp/locale/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=locale|
template&lt; class CharT &gt;
CharT toupper( CharT ch, const locale&amp; loc );
}}

Converts the character {{c|ch}} to uppercase if possible, using the conversion rules specified by the given locale's {{lc|std::ctype}} facet.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|ch|character}}
{{par|loc|locale}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Returns the uppercase form of {{c|ch}} if one is listed in the locale, otherwise returns {{c|ch}} unchanged.

===Notes===
Only 1:1 character mapping can be performed by this function, e.g. the uppercase form of 'ß' is (with some exceptions) the two-character string "SS", which cannot be obtained by {{lc|std::toupper}}.

===Possible implementation===
{{eq fun
|1=
template&lt;class CharT&gt;
CharT toupper(CharT ch, const std::locale&amp; loc)
{
    return std::use_facet&lt;std::ctype&lt;CharT&gt;&gt;(loc).toupper(ch);
}
}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cwctype&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;locale&gt;

int main()
{
    wchar_t c = L'\u017f'; // Latin small letter Long S ('ſ')

    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::hex &lt;&lt; std::showbase;

    std::cout &lt;&lt; "in the default locale, toupper(" &lt;&lt; (std::wint_t)c &lt;&lt; ") = "
              &lt;&lt; (std::wint_t)std::toupper(c, std::locale()) &lt;&lt; '\n';

    std::cout &lt;&lt; "in Unicode locale, toupper(" &lt;&lt; (std::wint_t)c &lt;&lt; ") = "
              &lt;&lt; (std::wint_t)std::toupper(c, std::locale("en_US.utf8")) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
in the default locale, toupper(0x17f) = 0x17f
in Unicode locale, toupper(0x17f) = 0x53
}}
